page.title: 16Shops
page.content: Originally there were two village shops in Childs Ercall selling a great variety of items unfortunately both have closed down except for the sub post section of one of them the small village of Ollerton has a butcher who has a shop in Newport but also sells meat in the village. A mobile shop comes to the village once a week, this shop sells a good range of items.Newport and Market Drayton both being approximately six miles from Childs Ercall are popular shopping towns. Telford (New Town) has a large shopping centre with many large stores and a hyper_Market, this too is a popular shopping centre.A little further afield there is Shrewsbury an excellent shopping centre and also the Potteries which is a collection of towns within easy reach of each other.
